SNP-Seekv3 Manual
=================

Welcome to the user manual for the SNP-Seek v3.

This guide walks you through logging in, querying SNP data, analyzing haplotypes, downloading results, and more.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents

   getting_started/index.rst
   user_manual/index.rst
   use_cases/index.rst
   faq/index.rst
